title.rendered: The Quick And Easy Way To Embed Instagram Feed On Website

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]We all have heard about Instagram. Launched in 2010, it still holds great relevance and still is one of the most influential social media platforms. So, what are the reasons behind its success? Easy to use interface? Various features that help users to express themselves? Platform to reach large audiences? All those reasons stand correct, but one prominent reason for its success is that it has that vibe. How about bringing the same vibe to the website? Wouldn’t it be beneficial? If this interests you, you have arrived at the right place because, in this blog, you will learn some of the simplest ways how to embed Instagram feed on website.   Adding an Instagram feed on the website not only helps to bring a certain vibe to the website but also helps in different ways like:
  • Improves the overall look and feel of the website
  • Increases the website traffic
  • Reduces bounce rate of the site
  • Brings a liveliness to the website
  • Boosts user-generated content related to your brand
  • Provides social proof to your visitors
  There are many other benefits associated with this strategy, but you can enjoy them only when you embed your Instagram feed on websites. And for your comfort, we have filtered the 3 most uncomplicated methods to do it.    

Simplest Ways To Embed Instagram Feed On Website

  There are ample ways to embed Instagram feed on websites; some require coding skills, while some demand more time. But for your convenience, we have the 3 most straightforward and manageable ways to do it. So without any further ado, let’s learn about them.  

1. Using Social Media Aggregators

Social media aggregators are excellent tools that have revolutionized the marketing scenario. It has simplified the complex process of collecting and displaying social media feeds on websites. There are ample social media aggregator tools currently available to embed the Instagram feed on the website with ease. While using the social media aggregators, all you have to do is collect the feed using your appropriate social media feed, copy the embedding code provided by the tool, and paste the code on the backend of the website. And that is it; a few simple steps and you can own a website that displays an Instagram feed on websites. Alongside easing the embedding process, it also provides useful features that add more significance to this strategy. Like, it provides a customization feature that enables you to personalize the widget as per your need. Here you can change the font size, font style, and more. Moreover, you can also choose from various themes and layouts to showcase Instagram content more professionally and organized. It also provides you with the moderation feature to remove the content you think is inappropriate or irrelevant to your website. You can either remove the post manually or choose the profanity filter. The profanity filter automatically pulls the content consisting of provided keywords.  Another amazing benefit of using social media aggregators is that they provide real updates. As soon as content uploads on the source, your widget will be showcasing it without any delay. Custom CSS, custom CTA, analytics, and responsive design are some of the other major features of the tool that makes it stand out from the crowd.  

2. Using WordPress plugins

If you have a WordPress website, then you can adopt this method. WordPress provides its users with some wonderful plugins that help users make their website more functional and attractive. There are ample Instagram feed WordPress plugins currently available on the WordPress plugin store that helps you in this cause. Install the plugin and embed the Instagram feed using the shortcode, and you will now have a WordPress website that showcases Instagram content on the website.  It provides more or less the same features as social media aggregators, helping you extract maximum use of the platform.  

3. Using Instagram embedding code

Instagram provides dedicated embedding code for each of its posts. So, if you want to avoid using any tool for your website, and If you are very picky on selecting the post for your website and have ample time to invest in finding appropriate content for your website, you can adopt this method. To embed a free Instagram widget on websites using Instagram embedding code, all you have to do is – copy the embedding code of the desired post that you want to add and paste it onto the backend of the website.   This process has some limitations like you cannot customize the widget as per your need and go through the same process if you want to embed any more content on the website.  

Summing It Up

Adding Instagram to the website can help you in the long run. The engaging and entertaining contents from the platforms have the potential to make your website more appealing to the consumers. The methods mentioned above are two of the simplest ways to do it. So what are you waiting for? Try them now and enjoy the incredible benefits it provides.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
